name: Racing Cars Drifting Drive
description:
Welcome to Car Drag Drift & Dirt Racing..!! Are you excited about high speed super fast Luxury cars drifting on highway? Fasten your seat belt and got ready for the furious drifts on hilly, desert and mountains roads. Fast nitrous heavy engine high speed cars are waiting for you. Just select your best luxury car and instantly start drifting. In this crazy car drifting game your mission is to reach the destination by making unlimited drifts on highway. Don’t go offroad while drifting luxury car. Offroad drifting lead you –ve in score and penalty will be charged to you. Achieve your goal in best time and earn coins as bonus points in return. Make more drifts, earn more coins and buy all luxury super cars for drifting.
Take a chance to drive and drift new modern cars. Like other car racing games like traffic car racing, Police car drifting, Nissan 3D drifting, turbo car racing, limo car drifting, Dubai desert real drifting, city road drifting, motorbike real racing, and super luxury cars racing etc… it is not just racing game but making drifts while racing is its main feature. It is really a fastest car racing and drifting game for all aged persons. Boost your car speed achieve your target. There will be no traffic rush on the single way road you are one and only one car drifter on such a vast highway. Show your best car driving, racing and super luxury car drifting skills in Dubai cars city drifting competition and win it.
Super gorgeous mountains and snowy environment will attract you to drift in it. You can enjoy 11 different luxury cars drifting in 6 different kinds of environment. Just chill, amuse and make modern car drifts. Make highest drifting score and Challenge to your friends. Enjoy limo car drifting, high speed car drifting, Nissan drifting in open sky on one way road. Enter your name in the list of top drifters of the year 2017 by making unlimited drifting with turbo cars.
Luxury car drifting Game Features:
- 11 high speed Super luxury drifting cars
- Attractive and realistic 3D environment modes
- Penalty on offroad drifting car
- Real car drifting sounds
- Smooth and realistic car drifting controls
- Simple and easy game play
- Free to drift all available luxury cars just make drift and earn coins to unlock
- Latest physics has been used in this city road drifting game
Give your effective feedback after playing this super luxury car drifting game.
